summary.en: Micro accessories and mini bags designed with one detail in mind — the one that matters.

seoBody.en: Caryina creates small-scale accessories designed in Positano, Italy. Every piece is built around a single considered detail.

answer.en: All pieces are designed in Positano and handcrafted in Italy.
We accept returns within 14 days of delivery for unworn items.
Standard shipping takes 5–7 business days. Express is available at checkout.

summary.en: Micro accessories and mini bags — each one built around a single considered detail.

description.en: Structured mini bags with a top handle.
Soft shoulder bags for everyday wear.
The smallest pieces in the collection.

summary.en: We're here to help. Reach us by email or WhatsApp.

responseSla.en: We respond within 24 hours on business days.

bullets.en: We do not sell your data.
We use cookies only for essential functionality.
Items must be unworn and in original condition.
Contact us to start a return.

summary.en: By using this site you agree to our terms.

bullets.en: All prices are in EUR and include VAT.
